item.title: MIUI OS1.0.6.0.UNJINXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Civi 4 Pro India
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Civi 4 Pro India

Codename: chenfeng

Version: OS1.0.6.0.UNJINXM | 14.0

Size: 6.8 GB

MD5: 925c2592eafbe59029a69b9be8a39ab2

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: New startup animation strategy makes apps launch faster
Updated the security patch to September 2024. Increased system security.
[Lock screen]
New: A switch for a feature that allows long pressing Home screen to edit it

Download: Here
